availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, policeman. Kentucky native. Married to Amanda Cross. Father of Emma Cross and William Cross.

bibl.p:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 2, p. 278. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 4, p. 166. Find A Grave, "William Cross (1815-1902)," Memorial #174457254
, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=Cross&GSfn=William&GSbyrel=all&GSdyrel=all&GSst=19&GScnty=1044&GScntry=4&GSob=n&GRid=174457254&df=all& (accessed August, 17, 2017).
